item.title: 印度中央银行维持利率不变，立场转为 "中性"，预示未来将降息
item.description: 印度储备银行（RBI）周三一如市场普遍预期维持关键利率不变，但将政策立场改为 "中性"，在经济放缓的早期迹象中为降息敞开了大门。【原文：The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) kept its key interest rate unchanged on Wednesday as widely expected, but changed its policy stance to "neutral", opening the door for rate cuts amid early signs of a slowdown in the economy.】

item.title: 早间新闻中国股市接受现实检验；欧洲股市震荡
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 即将上市的现代汽车印度公司的运营情况
item.description: 现代汽车印度公司将于下周启动首次公开募股（IPO），这是现代汽车母公司首次在韩国境外上市，也是印度自 2003 年以来首次汽车制造商 IPO。【原文：Hyundai Motor India will launch its IPO next week, marking parent Hyundai's first listing outside South Korea and India's first carmaker IPO since 2003.】

item.title: 现代汽车 30 亿美元印度首次公开募股定价为每股 1865-1960 卢比
item.description: 印度《金融快报》周三刊登的一则广告显示，现代汽车印度公司已将其首次公开募股（IPO）的价格区间定为1865卢比（22美元）至1960卢比（23美元），下周开始接受认购。【原文：Hyundai Motor India has set a price range of 1,865 rupees ($22) to 1,960 rupees ($23) for its initial public offering (IPO) that opens next week for subscriptions, a advertisement in the Financial Express newspaper showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 油价因以色列-真主党可能实现停火而下滑后保持稳定
item.description: 周三亚市盘中，油价保持稳定，交易商在权衡中东冲突事态发展的不确定性和持续看跌的基本面因素后作出了决定。【原文：Oil prices steadied in Asian trading on Wednesday, as traders weighed uncertainty surrounding developments in the Middle East conflict against continued bearish fundamentals.】

item.title: 波音公司在与罢工工会谈判后撤回薪酬提议
item.description: 波音公司周二表示，在与国际机械师和航空航天工人协会（IAM）进行谈判后，该公司已撤回其薪酬提议。【原文：Boeing on Tuesday said that it has withdrawn its pay offer after negotiations with the International Association of Machinists and Aerospace Workers (IAM), whose members are on a strike against the company.】

item.title: 中国炙热涨势暂缓，等待刺激政策出台
item.description: 由于投资者对中国经济复苏的热情有所减弱，周三中国股市下跌，大宗商品大幅下挫，而更广泛的市场则因对美国经济能够避免衰退并支撑全球需求的预期而趋于稳定。【原文：Chinese shares fell on Wednesday and commodities nursed sharp losses as investors tempered enthusiasm for a Chinese economic recovery, while broader markets steadied on expectations that the U.S. economy can avoid recession and support global demand.】

item.title: 美国概述谷歌搜索案的潜在补救措施
item.description: 美国司法部周二表示，正在考虑要求法官迫使 Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司终止独家协议，法院早些时候裁定这些协议帮助这家大型科技公司垄断了在线搜索领域。【原文：The U.S. Department of Justice said on Tuesday it was considering asking a judge to force Alphabet's Google to end exclusive agreements that the court earlier ruled helped give the Big Tech firm a monopoly in online search.】

item.title: 阿根廷将削减部分进口产品的繁文缛节
item.description: 阿根廷政府宣布将采取一些措施来精简和简化国内贸易业务。【原文：Argentina's government announced it will implement some measures to streamline and simplify trade operations in the country.】

item.title: 中国股市大幅下跌，连胜势头将被终结
item.description: 中国大陆股市周三大幅低开，并有望结束十日连涨，因为官员们未能对旨在振兴经济的刺激计划激起信心。【原文：Mainland China stocks opened sharply lower Wednesday and were poised to snap a 10-day winning streak after officials failed to inspire confidence in stimulus plans intended to revive the economy.】

item.title: 美联储会议纪要公布前美元持稳，降息后新西兰元下跌
item.description: 由于投资者暂停评估美国的利率路径前景，美元周三横盘震荡，在上周大幅反弹至七周高点后，给日元和其他主要货币带来了一些宽慰。【原文：The dollar drifted sideways on Wednesday, giving some relief to the yen and other major currencies after a sharp rally to a seven-week high last week, as investors paused to assess the interest rate path outlook for the United States.】

item.title: 新西兰央行降息 50 个基点，为更多宽松政策敞开大门
item.description: 新西兰央行周三将利率下调了 50 个基点，并表示即使通胀率已经恢复到目标水平，政策仍然是限制性的，这一明显的鸽派信号使得新西兰元汇率下滑，因为市场押注会有更多的宽松政策。【原文：New Zealand's central bank slashed rates by 50 basis points on Wednesday and said policy is still restrictive even though inflation has returned to target, a clear dovish signal that sent the kiwi dollar skidding as markets bet on more easing.】

item.title: 在报道 Couche-Tard 提高收购出价后，Seven & i 股价大涨 9.5
item.description: 据彭博新闻社报道，Alimentation Couche-Tard 将收购价格提高到每股 18.19 美元后，Seven & i Holdings 的股票在周三早盘交易中大涨 9.5%。【原文：Shares in Seven & i Holdings surged 9.5% in morning trading on Wednesday after Bloomberg News reported Alimentation Couche-Tard upped its acquisition price offer to $18.19 per share.】

item.title: 美联储副主席杰斐逊：9 月降息 "及时
item.description: 美联储副主席菲利普-杰斐逊（Philip Jefferson）周二表示，美联储上个月降息50个基点是 "及时的"，既不是被动的，也不是主动的。【原文：The Federal Reserve's 50-basis-point interest-rate cut last month was "timely" and was neither reactive, nor proactive, Fed Vice Chair Philip Jefferson said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美联储副主席杰斐逊：降息旨在保持美国就业市场强劲
item.description: 美联储副主席菲利普-杰斐逊（Philip Jefferson）周二表示，美国央行上个月降息半个百分点的目的是为了在通胀持续缓解的情况下保持劳动力市场的强劲。【原文：Federal Reserve Vice Chair Philip Jefferson on Tuesday said the U.S. central bank's half-percentage-point interest-rate cut last month was aimed at keeping the labor market strong even as inflation continues to ease.】

item.title: 伍德赛德公司以 12 亿美元完成对 Tellurian 公司的收购
item.description: 伍德赛德能源公司（Woodside Energy）周三表示，该公司已完成对美国液化天然气开发商Tellurian公司的收购，包括其美国墨西哥湾液化天然气出口项目，包括债务在内的收购价格为12亿美元。【原文：Woodside Energy said on Wednesday it has completed the acquisition of U.S. liquefied natural gas developer Tellurian , including its U.S. Gulf Coast LNG export project, for $1.2 billion including debt.】

item.title: 优衣库的海外扩张使其所有者的年度利润激增 24
item.description: 休闲装巨头优衣库的日本所有者预计，随着其品牌在西方市场取得进展以及在中国的业务复苏，该公司的利润将超过自己的预期，连续第三年创下历史新高。【原文：The Japanese owner of casual wear giant Uniqlo is projected to beat its own forecast in what would be a third straight year of record profits as its brand makes inroads in western markets and its business in China recovers.】

item.title: 日本制造商 10 月信心上升，对中国的担忧挥之不去
item.description: 路透社周三进行的月度民意调查显示，日本制造商对10月份的经营状况信心增强，但他们对中国经济的复苏步伐仍持谨慎态度。【原文：Japanese manufacturers turned more confident about business conditions in October, a Reuters monthly poll showed on Wednesday, but they remained wary about the pace of China's economic recovery.】

item.title: 早间竞价：投资者阅读美联储茶叶，回避中国刺激政策
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 消息人士称，评级下调迫在眉睫，波音正在权衡筹集现金的方案
item.description: 两位熟悉此事的消息人士称，波音公司正在研究通过出售股票和类似股票的证券筹集数十亿美元的方案，因为这家飞机制造商正努力避免其信用评级滑落至垃圾级。【原文：Boeing is examining options to raise billions of dollars through a sale of stock and equity-like securities, two sources familiar with the matter said, as the planemaker tries to avoid slipping in to junk territory on its credit ratings.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，花旗回击纽约关于欺诈案的诉讼
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二报道，花旗集团的律师已敦促美国地区法官保罗-奥特肯（Paul Oetken）驳回总检察长莱蒂西亚-詹姆斯（Letitia James）于今年 1 月提起的诉讼，该诉讼指控花旗集团旗下的花旗银行未能向成为网络骗子受害者的客户提供补偿。【原文：Citigroup's lawyers have urged U.S. District Judge Paul Oetken to dismiss a suit filed in January by Attorney General Letitia James, which accuses its Citibank unit of failing to reimburse customers who fall victim to online scammers, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，辉瑞首席执行官计划会见激进投资者 Starboard Value
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周二援引知情人士的话报道称，辉瑞公司首席执行官阿尔伯特-布尔拉（Albert Bourla）计划与激进投资者Starboard Value会面。【原文：Pfizer CEO Albert Bourla plans to meet activist investor Starboard Value, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Unifor 与加拿大太平洋堪萨斯城公司启动谈判
item.description: Unifor 周二表示，在与加拿大国家铁路公司（Canadian National Railway）展开谈判仅几周后，它已与堪萨斯城加拿大太平洋铁路公司（Canadian Pacific Kansas City）启动了合同谈判。【原文：Unifor said on Tuesday it has initiated contract negotiations with Canadian Pacific Kansas City , just weeks after it opened negotiations with Canadian National Railway .】

item.title: 罢工持续，标普将波音评级列入负面信用观察名单
item.description: 全球评级机构 S&P 周二表示，已将波音公司的评级列入负面信用观察名单，因为这家美国飞机制造商的约 33,000 名工人仍在罢工，导致其最畅销的喷气式飞机停产。【原文：Global ratings agency S&P said on Tuesday it had placed Boeing's rating on CreditWatch negative as about 33,000 of the U.S. planemaker's workers remain on strike, halting production of its best-selling jets.】

item.title: 中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪预计 2025 年墨西哥电动汽车销量将增至 10 万辆
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪墨西哥负责人豪尔赫-巴列霍（Jorge Vallejo）周二表示，该公司预计今年将在墨西哥销售 5 万辆电动汽车（EV），2025 年将达到 10 万辆。【原文：Chinese electric automaker BYD expects to sell 50,000 electric vehicles (EVs) in Mexico this year, and then 100,000 in 2025, the company's Mexican head Jorge Vallejo said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美联储主席柯林斯预计将进一步降息，因相信通胀正在缓解
item.description: 波士顿联邦储备银行行长苏珊-柯林斯（Susan Collins）周二表示，随着通胀趋势越来越弱，美国央行很有可能会进行更多的降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Boston President Susan Collins said on Tuesday that with inflation trends growing weaker it is very probable that the U.S. central bank can deliver more interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 消息人士称，美国联邦航空局可能在本月批准 SpaceX 星际飞船 5 的许可证
item.description: 一位消息人士周二告诉路透社，美国联邦航空管理局最快可能在本月批准发射 SpaceX 的 "星际飞船 5 号"（Starship 5）。【原文：The Federal Aviation Administration could approve a license for the launch of SpaceX's Starship 5 as soon as this month, a source told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 宝洁创始人后代要求罢免首席执行官和董事会委员会的申请失败
item.description: 本周二，宝洁公司创始人的后裔在要求罢免首席执行官乔恩-默勒（Jon Moeller）和负责环境可持续发展的委员会成员的诉讼中败诉，因为他们被指控未能管理消费品制造商供应链中的森林砍伐风险。【原文：Descendants of Procter & Gamble's founders lost a bid on Tuesday to oust CEO Jon Moeller and members of the committee overseeing environmental sustainability for allegedly failing to manage deforestation risks in the consumer goods maker's supply chain.】

item.title: 巴西总检察长支持恢复社交媒体平台 X
item.description: 巴西总检察长办公室周二在一份声明中告诉巴西最高法院，在社交媒体平台 X 因法律纠纷在当地被关闭后，总检察长办公室认为没有理由不恢复该平台。【原文：Brazil's attorney general's office told the country's Supreme Court on Tuesday that it does not see reasons why social medial platform X should not be reinstated, according to a statement, after it was shut down locally due to a legal dispute.】

item.title: 美联储博斯蒂克称劳动力市场放缓但并不缓慢，就业增长 "强劲
item.description: 亚特兰大联储主席拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）周二表示，上周的就业数据证实，尽管美国劳动力市场可能正在放缓，但美国劳动力市场依然强劲，4.1%的失业率接近充分就业水平，雇主增加工作岗位的速度超过了人口增长所需的速度。【原文：Last week's jobs numbers confirm the U.S. labor market remains strong even though it may be slowing, with a 4.1% unemployment rate around what is considered full employment and employers adding jobs faster than what is needed to account for population growth, Atlanta Federal Reserve President Raphael Bostic said on Tuesday.】
